welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wolomin, a charming city known for its rich history and scenic beauty. We hope you enjoy your time here and discover all the hidden gems this city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mazury Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for seasonal and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frederic Chopin Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Frederic Chopin Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A modern terminal at Frederic Chopin Airport, dedicated to international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Modlin Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Modlin Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
